casebody.data:
Trust Company of Chicago, Administrator of Estate of Florence D. Steven, Deceased, Appellant, v. Sutherland Hotel Company, Appellee.Gen. No. 42,448.

Matchett, J., dissents.

opinion filed May 1, 1944;rehearing denied May 15, 1944.Samuel A. Rinella, for appellant; Joseph Barbera and Harry G. Fins, of counsel; Lord, Bissell & Kadyk, for appellee.

Opinion by

Justice Niemeyer.

Not to be published in full.
